title: Kochava faces legal action over sale of location data
description: Federal Trade Commission says the data could be used to track visits to reproductive-health clinics.

title: Advanced cyber-attack: NHS doctors' paperwork piles up
description: They say it could take months to clear the backlog caused by a continuing cyber-attack.

title: Can vinyl records become greener by removing the PVC?
description: Records are traditionally made with polyvinyl chloride but one company is trying to change that.

title: Mukesh Ambani: India tycoon launches $25bn 5G rollout plan
description: Mukesh Ambani says his firm is also working with Google to develop a budget 5G smartphone.
